function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of LDA and NMF algorithm to analyze Covid-19 impact may lead to biased or inaccurate topic detection.","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the impact of Covid-19 on the global economy, potentially leading to ineffective strategic measures.","Mitigation":"Validation of topic modeling results with other sources of information and expert analysis to verify accuracy.","Technologies":"Validation tools and techniques for topic modeling results.","People":"Public, global institutions, policymakers","Owner":"Data scientists, researchers, global institutions"},{"Description":"Relying solely on sentiment analysis of news and social media to assess the impact of Covid-19 on the financial world may lead to incomplete or biased conclusions.","Impact":"Misinterpretation of the sentiment data, leading to inaccurate assessments of the impact on the stock market.","Mitigation":"Incorporating multiple data sources and statistical methods to validate the sentiment analysis.","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools, sentiment analysis validation methods.","People":"Investors, financial analysts, researchers","Owner":"Data scientists, financial analysts, researchers"},{"Description":"Reliance on Twitter feed for predicting stock market changes may lead to inaccurate or biased results.","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions of stock market changes, potentially leading to investment losses or misinformed decisions.","Mitigation":"Diversifying data sources and using multiple predictive models to validate the accuracy of Twitter feed predictions.","Technologies":"Predictive modeling, data integration, diversified data sources.","People":"Investors, financial analysts","Owner":"Data scientists, financial analysts"}]}
